Beautiful little earrings! Look very pretty and slip right in and fit very well! No reaction to my ears which is amazing!  Update: After a few wears in my ears, both of the middle stones came out. I messaged bling jewellery to ask for a replacement or in any way the extra stones could be sent out to me (I would pay for the stones) so I would glue in myself and they simply passed the responsibility to Amazon (who store the items). They did not give a hoot about the product they had made and supplied and feel very disappointed in them and won't buy from them again. Amazon however were amazing and offered me a full refund for the product with the opportunity to buy brand new ones.
